title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not correctly identified.
OB: When attempting to create a new nested class using the new class wizard, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click on the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard.
